name: Link Devices to Managed Configurations
description: Links devices to a specified configuration.

config_id.description:
Identifier of the managed configuration to associate with the devices.
Example: 2836d89d-1e98-4377-92b7-0a76ac2a7699

type.description:
Type of configuration. Currently, only option 2 is supported.
	- 2 — Workstations and servers.
Example: 2

device_ids.description:
List of IDs of devices to link to the specified managed configuration..
Example: cb509c17-7b88-461a-ba3b-3d43e29e6cd4,2c13685e-7d1f-4726-9ad3-5c8fa7718bab
